perturbation.original_text: The Adviser agrees to defend and indemnify the Trust, and its trustees, officers and agent from and against any and all liability, losses, claims and damages arising from any inaccurate or incomplete statement provided by the Adviser (or its officers, employees, directors and agents) for inclusion in the Fund's prospectus or statement of additional information. The Adviser agrees to defend and indemnify the Trust, and its trustees, officers and agents from and against any and all liability, losses, claims and damages arising from your willful misfeasance, bad faith or gross negligence on the Adviser's part or the part of the Adviser's officers, employees, directors and agents in the performance of the Adviser's duties under this Agreement, or by reason of reckless disregard by any of such persons of the Adviser's obligations and duties under this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: The Adviser agrees to defend and indemnify the Trust, and its trustees, officers and agent from and against any and all liability, losses, claims and damages arising from any inaccurate or incomplete statement provided by the Adviser (or its officers, employees, directors and agents) for inclusion in the Fund's prospectus or statement of additional information. The Adviser’s liability, losses, claims and damages arising from your willful misfeasance, bad faith or gross negligence on the Adviser's part or the part of the Adviser's officers, employees, directors and agents in the performance of the Adviser's duties under this Agreement, or by reason of reckless disregard by any of such persons of the Adviser's obligations and duties under this Agreement may be limited to the amount of fees earned in the year such liability, losses, claims and damages occurred. The Adviser’s defense of the Trust shall be limited to only those claims where the Trust provides reasonable notice of a potential claim
perturbation.explanation: The added sentence introduces a limitation on the Adviser's liability, potentially contradicting the expansive indemnification obligations previously stated. Also, the conditions on the defense obligations restrict the indemnity

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement may be amended at any time by written instrument executed by each of the parties hereto.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement may be amended at any time by written instrument executed by each of the parties hereto. However, amendments that materially alter the compensation structure require approval by a simple majority of the Adviser's executive board.
perturbation.explanation: This adds a condition for changes to the compensation structure. This may contradict the original statement since it doesn't need the other parties approval. The original statement says it must be executed by *each* of the parties.

perturbation.original_text: The Adviser shall at all times conform to: (i) all applicable provisions of the Act and any rules and regulations adopted thereunder; (ii) the provisions of the Registration Statement of the Trust under the Securities Act of 1933 and the Act as amended from time to time; (iii) the provisions of the Agreement and Declaration of Trust and the By-Laws of the Trust; and (iv) any other applicable provisions of state and federal law.
perturbation.changed_text: The Adviser shall at all times conform to: (i) all applicable provisions of the Act and any rules and regulations adopted thereunder; (ii) the provisions of the Registration Statement of the Trust under the Securities Act of 1933 and the Act as amended from time to time; (iii) the provisions of the Agreement and Declaration of Trust and the By-Laws of the Trust; and (iv) any other applicable provisions of state and federal law, except when those laws conflict with the business objectives of the Adviser.
perturbation.explanation: The added clause creates an exception, allowing the Adviser to disregard applicable laws and regulations if they conflict with their business objectives. This fundamentally contradicts the initial statement requiring full compliance.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Investment Company Act of 1940, Securities Act of 1933
